UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
RFC"!VF-9
Radio STATION
12 9 24 AM IS58
April 11, 1956
‘7
Professor Schooley:
In reply to your letter of April 6,
1956 to Mr. DeLong, please be advised that your
proposal to charge a 5$ service against the ex¬
penditures from your NAEB Trust Fund is satis¬
factory with this office. This will place the
NAEB Trust account on the same basis as the
Kellogg Trust account.
